item.description:
PLEASE NOTE THE STARTING TIME SHIFT TO 3:00pm. Please let me know if that is a problem for anyone. Thanks!


The second part of Kick-in-the-Art, trying to get myself back to the creative groove.

And maybe you need a kick in the art! Bring your own materials and projects, or use what we have in the Studio to play with. All you need is an open mind.

Please come by and have some fun! We will be there until at least 8:00pm, with one important caveat: If no one RSVPs I can't promise I'll be there at 2:00pm.
item.how_to_find_us: Downstairs door on the side in the parking lot will be marked.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Kick-in-the-Art Open House, part 2
